title: BRANDING TERROR book cover
content:
Hey everyone! I have a typeface ID request I am hoping someone can help me with. Shouldn't be too tough, I hope. It's the typeface used on the cover and throughout the book "BRANDING TERROR". At first I thought it was MISO but it's not. Any thoughts?

Great book BTW.

author: Seabuckle

comments.content: [T-Star Mono Round](http://web.archive.org/web/20140527134650/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/gestalten/tstar_mono_round_ot) by Michael Mischler for Gestalten
